name: Incoming Transmission (flassari, famer)
description:
The Low-Orbit spaceship TC31 has lost control of its thrusters and is now tumbling aimlessly through space. Use our space probes to assume remote control of the spaceship and bring the pilot back to Earth. Use caution, as transmission distances can delay control input. Keep our pilot alive!

Use left and right arrows or A and D keys to control the spaceship.
